title: Software Engineer - Kreditrisk
company_industry: Financial Services, Banking, and Software Development
description:
Välkommen att bli en viktig del av vårt nystartade team, Kreditrisk! Uppdraget är att säkerställa korrekt riskhantering vid orderläggning samt uppföljning och bevakning. Vi arbetar med systemlösningar som täcker både pre-trade och post-trade, och du får möjlighet att påverka och utveckla några av våra allra mest kritiska plattformar.
 



  





 Känner du att detta kan vara utmaningen du söker? Ansök idag och bli en del av vårt team – tillsammans skapar vi en tryggare och effektivare kredit- och derivathantering för miljoner kunder!
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 I denna roll ansvarar du bland annat för att designa, utveckla och implementera robusta systemlösningar inom kreditrisk, derivathandel och finansiella instrument. Du arbetar med både pre-trade- och post-trade-processer där du bland annat optimerar prestanda, säkerställer dataintegritet och implementerar avancerade matematiska modeller.
 



  





 Hos oss får du arbeta i en innovativ och dynamisk miljö med stort handlingsutrymme, där din tekniska expertis och ditt driv står i centrum. Du blir en del av ett engagerat team som arbetar agilt och där möjligheter till både teknisk och personlig utveckling erbjuds. Här får du chans att påverka och forma framtidens finanssystem tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden** 



* Designa, utveckla och vidareutveckla våra systemlösningar med fokus på både pre-trade och post-trade.
* Arbeta med migrering och optimering av befintliga system samt utveckling av nya funktioner.
* Använda avancerade matematiska modeller och analyser för att hantera komplexa samband inom kreditrisk och derivathandel.
* Utveckla lösningar i en molnbaserad miljö och säkerställa att systemen integreras sömlöst med bankens övriga ekosystem.
* Kommunicera tekniska och matematiska koncept på ett pedagogiskt sätt samt samarbeta med interna intressenter.



  





**Vi söker dig som** 




 Du har en relevant utbildning inom exempelvis datavetenskap, matematik eller teknisk fysik och gedigen erfarenhet av systemutveckling – gärna från bank, finans eller fintech. Du har ett genuint intresse för finansmarknaden med särskilt fokus på, derivat och handel. Du besitter gedigna kunskaper i
 **Java** 
 och har erfarenhet av att arbeta med affärskritiska system.
 



  





**Det är meriterande om du dessutom har:** 



* Erfarenhet av C++ och fullstackutveckling.
* Kunskaper om molnteknologi (t.ex. GCP, AWS, Azure).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i mindre, självstyrande team med stort eget ansvar.
* En stark analytisk förmåga, med ett strukturerat arbetssätt för att bryta ner komplexa problem och presentera tekniska lösningar på ett tydligt och pedagogiskt sätt.



  





**Ansökan:** 




 Skicka gärna din ansökan snarast då urvalet sker löpande, dock senast den
 **6** 
**april** 
 . Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl p.g.a. GDPR.
 *Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag/annonssäljare undanbedes.* 




  





 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Embedded Software Engineer
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Spectator Sports, and Entertainment Providers
description:
**Play a crucial role to integrate our ground-breaking tracking software with our camera platform** 




  





**WANT TO REVOLUTIONIZE GOLF?** 




  





**Our mission** 
 is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by developing tracing technology for TV and gamification to ranges. Our product brings people together and encourages them to get active which enables a healthier lifestyle. Our range technology is used globally and millions of people spend their quality time bonding and playing with their family and friends. Our broadcast technology is aired worldwide and makes the tournaments really enjoyable for the TV viewers. ⛳️ 📺 🎥
 



  





**At our new office** 
 , you can expect to meet humble, helpful and driven colleagues. You will join an organization where everyone has a voice and can make an impact. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to something meaningful as we undergo exciting changes and growth. We are committed to creating an environment where you can grow professionally and individually. As well as creating a social work environment by creating fun activities like morning fika, gym sessions, mob programming, after-work, table tennis, and golf simulator sessions to name a few! 🥳 🏓 ☕️
 



  





**We are proud** 
 to be on a journey where we're focused on helping people worldwide improve their golf game which leads to healthy, active and social lifestyles. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our newly renovated R&D office in Stockholm, Sweden. Join us at Toptracer Technologies and be part of a team dedicated to creating positive change through technology and innovation! 🚀 💻 💙
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 Toptracer is currently looking for an experienced Embedded Software Engineer to our embedded platform team. You will play a crucial role to integrate our ground-breaking tracking software with our camera platform. Together with your team you will have opportunities to shape the architecture and design of our next-generation ball tracking system, serving thousands of Toptracer golf ranges all over the world.
 



  





**TECH STACK** 




 Linux Kernal | Yocto
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Opportunity to develop a crucial part of Toptracer’s technology and possibility to innovate and have influence on the technical and architectural roadmap.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to other members of the team.
* Collaborate in cross-functional initiatives together with teams of experienced algorithm, hardware and software engineers.
* Join a unique company culture that emphasizes fun, caring, and teamwork.



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, or a related field.
* Proven experience in programming embedded devices and building an embedded Linux system from scratch.
* Worked with Yocto or other tools to build customized Linux systems.
* Experience with writing Linux kernel drivers.
* Experience with designing embedded systems with foolproof boot and software upgrade capabilities.
* Strong proficiency in modern software engineering principles and practices.
* Solid knowledge and long experience with C and C++.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* A solid understanding and practical experience of embedded architectures.
* Effective ways to communicate and strong collaboration skills.



  





**IT`S ALSO GREAT IF YOU** 



* Experience with FPGA programming.
* Worked with video for Linux (V4L2) framework.
* Experience with bare metal OS less or RTOS programming.
* Some experience with video processing.



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates who come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all the colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range near your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, Courage, One Team, Fun and Excellence.
 



  





**Activities** 



* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Stockholm. We hope to hear from you soon!

title: Android Developer
description:
We are a rapidly scaling e-commerce business based in Stockholm, dedicated to revolutionizing the way people shop online. Our platform is growing fast, and we are on the lookout for a highly experienced Senior Android Developer to join our innovative team and help us build a best-in-class mobile app from the ground up.
 



  





 As a Senior Android Developer, you will play a pivotal role in building and scaling our Android platform, helping to shape the future of our mobile presence. This is a greenfield project, giving you the opportunity to have a direct and significant impact on the architecture, development, and direction of our Android application. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, backend developers, and product managers, to create a seamless and innovative mobile experience for our users.
 



  





**What you will do** 



* Lead the development of the Android mobile application from the ground up, ensuring high-quality, scalable code and architecture.
* Collaborate with product and design teams to define mobile app features and ensure seamless integration with the backend systems.
* Architect, implement, and deploy high-performance solutions that scale to meet growing user demand.
* Take ownership of the Android platform, from development and optimization to testing and deployment.
* Mentor and guide junior developers, helping to elevate the overall technical skills and standards of the team.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and Android best practices to ensure our platform remains cutting-edge.



  





**A bit about you** 



* Minimum of 5 years of professional Android development experience with a strong portfolio of shipping Android apps.
* Proven experience in building greenfield platforms from scratch.
* Expertise in Kotlin and Java, along with strong knowledge of Android SDK, APIs, and libraries.
* Solid understanding of mobile application architecture, design patterns, and best practices.
* Experience with tools like Android Studio, Git, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Familiarity with modern mobile development frameworks, APIs, and third-party libraries.
* Strong problem-solving skills and an ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
* A passion for clean, maintainable, and performant code.
* Excellent communication skills in English.



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Experience in scaling mobile applications for a rapidly growing user base.
* Previous exposure to e-commerce platforms or consumer-facing mobile apps.
* Knowledge of backend technologies and integration points with mobile applications.
* Experience with .NET is a plus, as it can be beneficial in understanding and integrating with the broader tech stack.

title: MCP Dev (fullstack engineer, financial data visualization)
description:
We are urgently looking for a frontend developer to create a proof-of-concept for a revolutionary
 **visual programming environment that combines natural language with dynamic block composition** 
 - a system where
 **blocks intelligently adapt based on context and zoom level** 
 . This project initially focuses on trading strategies but with broader applications.
 **We need someone who can make complex systems feel intuitive without tutorials.** 




  





**Apply with portfolio and a few lines on your fit and motivation to ahmed@batonics.com** 




  





**Required** 



* an impressive portfolio
* a fast and strong coder
* Familiarity with cursor and MCPs



  





  





**Preferable** 
 :
 


* Sweden or EU based
* Beyond front-end/UX - fullstack-ish
* Experience in designing dynamic visualization systems that adapt to complexity like intelligent zoom
* Available immediately
* Experience with color theory, relationship highlighting, progressive disclosure in complex interfaces
* Experience in semantic zooming , contextual detail management, auto-grouping/coalescence of components
* Interest in joining long-term as a core team member



  





**Compensation** 
 : Hourly based for the first 3 months

This could revolutionize how people interact with data and algorithms across multiple domains.

title: Platform Support Developer
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging the status quo in the property management industry. We're committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our cloud-based platform is unique, and we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player in a brief time. Our global product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?
   

  

**About The Role**
 Are you a techie who enjoys variation and growth, both personally and professionally? Join a fast-growing, global market leader for an engaging kick-start to your career. As a Platform Support Developer, you will be part of a dedicated team responsible for our unique platform. You will primarily work with 1st, 2nd, and 3rd line support and maintenance support for internal and external SaaS customers. The role includes bug fixes and maintenance with a focus on both Backend and Frontend. The work varies a lot, so you will be handling diverse tasks at the same time, meaning you will keep updated, learn, and develop constantly.
   

  

 Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. The platform is unique in the sense that it is developed specifically for property management. In a very short time, we have positioned ourselves as a leading and innovative player in the market. We have great plans and tremendous growth and will continue our global expansion.
   

  

 What do we expect of you?
   

  

 We believe you are a positive, humble and responsible person who enjoys taking your own initiative, who can drive ideas from start to finish, and be a team player. You strive to develop yourself both personally and technically, and you enjoy helping others. You are a great communicator who can explain complex concepts to all kinds of users, no matter their knowledge level.
   

  

**Experience**
* Ideally, you have a technical background or education.
* Any kind of Customer Service experience.
* Knowledge in programming and/or web development (PHP/Angular).
* A genuine interest in technology.
* Ability to express yourself clearly in English and Swedish both verbally and in writing.
* It’s also great if you have previous experience in technical support.
* Any knowledge from our tech stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP/Slim and Angular), is also very appreciated.


 What we offer
   

  

* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.


**Location**
 Our office is on the top floor in the newly built
 *Sthlm 04* 
 , which offers stunning views over Stockholm.
   

  

**Excited?**
 If you are excited about being part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position. This is a great opportunity to grow your skills and, in the long term, potentially step into a developer role within one of our brilliant product teams.
   

  

 👉🏽 Why we formed Odevo
   

  

 🔍 About Odevo
   

  

 🌐 Our Software

title: Sr. Backend Developer • Product Library
company_industry: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we are seeking a dedicated Backend Engineer to join one of our teams at the forefront of shaping innovative solutions and crafting modern digital products that positively impact people's lives across our organization. If this introduction sparks your interest, keep reading – the best is yet to come!
   

  

**Job Description:**
 PayPal in Sweden originated from Zettle, focusing on commerce services targeting small and medium businesses, and is now expanding to contribute to the wider PayPal portfolio.
   

  

**Meet Your Team**
 Our Product Library Team's mission is to create a scalable and reliable catalog service that serves the entire PayPal ecosystem, delivering seamless solutions to help businesses grow. If you’re passionate about solving complex challenges, working on high-impact projects, and driving innovation, our team is the perfect fit for you.
   

  

**Your way to Impact**
 We are seeking a Senior Backend Developer to join a talented team in charge of designing, building, and maintaining a suite of services that power PayPal globally, ensuring high availability, scalability, and performance. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology on the AWS cloud, applying best practices in cloud architecture. Additionally, you’ll collaborate with a team of skilled and highly motivated engineers (Backend, iOS, Android, and QA) to deliver a world-class experience for our users.
   

  

**Your day to day**
* You will focus on your learning while helping to deliver high quality solutions to our users.
* You will work as part of an agile team, planning, refining, delivering and inspecting sprint deliveries.
* You work closely with product and design to understand context and vision.
* You will learn and work with your peers in the Backend chapter to make incremental platform improvements and increase learning opportunities for all in a supportive environment.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Programming/Coding: Write clean, maintainable, tested and efficient code in backend programming languages such as Java and Kotlin.
* API Development: Design, develop, and maintain APIs as a product and/or to support frontend applications.
* Database Management: Design, implement, and manage relational and NoSQL databases, ensuring data integrity and security.
* Performance: Optimize server performance to handle high traffic and large data volumes efficiently.
* Security: Implement best practices for securing data and backend services.
* Automation: Develop scripts and tools to automate routine tasks and improve backend workflows.
* Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for backend processes, systems, and APIs.
* Monitoring and Observability: Implement and maintain monitoring and observability tools to track system health, performance, and uptime.
* System Design: Design and implement scalable and robust system architectures that meet business requirements and ensure high availability. Design should also be maintainable - easy to change and with clear ownership.
* Designing, developing, and maintaining RESTful APIs, including authentication, authorization, and versioning (e.g., Dropwizard, Springboot): Solid knowledge. Engineers at these levels are expected to independently design and maintain complex APIs, ensuring robust authentication and authorization mechanisms.
* Relational databases (SQL) and basic operations (e.g., Postgres, MySQL): Expert. Engineers should be adept at designing database schemas, optimizing queries, and handling advanced database operations.
* Profiling, caching, and optimizing backend systems for high performance and scalability: Experienced. Engineers should demonstrate a high level of proficiency in diagnosing performance issues and implementing effective caching and optimization strategies.


**We Believe in You**
 Interested? Don't hesitate to apply or/and let's talk – we'd love to get to know you!
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0123525

title: Sr. Industry Solutions Architect, Automotive & Manufacturing Technical Strategy Team
description:
**Description**
 Do you have a passion for cloud computing and a proven record of driving change in the automotive industry? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you to join our team as a Senior Industry Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services (AWS).
   

  

 As a Senior Industry Solutions Architect in our Automotive & Manufacturing Industry Business Unit, you'll play a key role in accelerating the digital transformation of the automotive sector. You'll work closely with automakers, Tier 1 suppliers, and software partners to design and implement innovative edge-to-cloud solutions that unlock the power of the cloud and accelerate the development of software-defined and connected vehicles.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Provide deep business and technical expertise to help customers and partners architect, design, and implement cutting-edge solutions
* Collaborate cross-functionally with sales, professional services, and product teams to develop demos, white papers, and reference architectures
* Create and deliver engaging technical presentations and webinars to share your knowledge with the industry
* Work closely with the AWS developer community to shape future cloud services and features
* Become a trusted advisor to C-suite executives, guiding them towards strategic cloud-based initiatives


**To Excel In This Position, You'll Need**
* Extensive experience leading successful end-to-end automotive initiatives with Tier 1 suppliers and OEMs
* Expertise in in-vehicle software, edge computing, and cloud-based solutions
* Strong technical skills, including the ability to clearly explain complex architectures
* Excellent business acumen and the ability to turn strategies into actionable plans
* A passion for driving innovation and creating exceptional customer experiences


 If you're ready to make a lasting impact on the future of the automotive industry, we'd love to hear from you. Apply today and join the AWS team!
   

  

 Open to traveling up to 50% domestic and international.
   

  

**About The Team**
 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
   

  

 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Knowledge of software development tools and methodologies
* Experience communicating across technical and non-technical audiences, including executive level stakeholders or clients
* Experience in design, implementation, or consulting in applications and infrastructures
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Automotive, or related field of study and 8+ years of related work experience


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Knowledge of cloud architecture
* Knowledge of data intelligence workloads for generating customers' insights and personalized experiences
* Knowledge of connected mobility workloads
* Technical experience within the Automotive industry


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2855329

title: Lead Architect
description:
* Hybrid


**Job Description**
 The world is changing in the way we consume products, from ownership to usership, and DigitalRoute is positioned in the centre of the transition. Because, when enterprises pivot to usage-based business models, they often make an unfortunate discovery. Their systems weren’t built to handle the massive data volumes and complexity that usage-based models generate. This causes them to leak revenue and respond too slowly to customer demand. DigitalRoute solves this by creating a real-time usage data layer for enterprises. Our products transform raw usage data into clear information for billing, in real time and at high scale.
   

  

**About The Job**
 The Lead MZ/PE Architect will work in one of our two main product areas, where our classic offerings called Mediation Zone and Private Edition are created. All product development is done by our own teams in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Östersund and Kuala Lumpur.
   

  

 The Lead MZ/PE Architect role will report directly to our global Head of Engineering.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will own and drive the software architecture work for both of these products, which have around 90% shared codebase.
* You will lead and prioritize work through collaboration, coaching, and decision-making. And you’ll do some coding as well.
* You will be working closely with PM/POs for these products, balancing business requirements and technical must-haves together.


 You will also be involved in other things; anything from leading investigations and improving quality to coaching AI-assisted development or recommending changes to priorities.
   

  

**The support around you**
 You will work right next to a lot of good help; software engineering teams, PMs/POs, Security Architect, Lead Architect for the other product, management, Support, Product Documentation, etc.
   

  

**About You**
* You have extensive experience developing transaction-safe and high-performing enterprise software in Java, including leading architectural work. If your experience is related to advanced integration or mediation, that’s even better.
* You are of course very skilled technically, but you are also communicative. You are comfortable leading meetings, explaining, discussing and collaborating, and you can prioritize, take in feedback and make decisions.
* You have a strong Java developer background, even if you may not be spending 100% of your time coding these days.
* You are quite comfortable working with cloud technologies (AWS/GCP/Azure/OCI) as well as with Docker and Kubernetes – and with Kafka and various databases.
* We often speak English in our offices, so your English needs to be good. If you also speak Swedish – great. If not, you can learn that on the job.


**About Us**
 We produce some really cool things for very large and well-known customers. Many of them are already waiting for the results of the work YOU will do. Read more about the product and the company here:  and here:
   

  

 In short? Well, we offer very advanced and high-performing automated mediation\* software for many of the world’s largest or most well-known companies. Examples? Well, how about Booking.com, Orange, Microsoft and many more?
   

  

* Advanced systems integration (kind of), but lots more and on steroids


**We offer**
 Competitive salary with a good pension plan and insurances. Other nice benefits as well. Good coffee, fussball, and all that, yes.
   

  

* free access to Udemy learning
* we pay for AWS certifications.


**Location**
 Stockholm (modern, comfy office). Hybrid work, yes.
   

  

 We apply continuous selection, and the position may be filled before the last application date. Please note that we do not take applications via e-mail or LinkedIn.
   

  

 DigitalRoute wants to be part of an inclusive and diverse environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, or age. You will be part of a global and diverse company where our differences are our strengths.
   

  

 Apply now! We look forward to you joining us!

title: Head of Sales & Startup Founder (March 2025)
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Note: This is not for full-time employment, but an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup.** 




  





**Who you are** 




 You are a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record of success. Your expertise extends beyond simply closing deals; you possess the vision and leadership qualities to build a company from the ground up. Whether you're driven by disrupting new markets or leveraging your skills for positive global impact, this opportunity offers you the chance to become a CEO and co-found a groundbreaking company.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Director BMC Operations
job_function: Business Development, General Business, and Strategy/Planning
description:
**(Flexible location)**
 Are you ready to shape the future of our industry with us? At Seco, we have an exciting opportunity for an experienced professional to join our global team as a
 **Director Brand, Marketing & Communication (BMC) Operations** 
 . This is a
 **new role in a newly established function** 
 , where you will have the unique opportunity to be a part of a management team and support shaping an effective way of work. If you are ready to lead change and make a significant impact, we welcome you to join us on this exciting journey!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As
 **the Director of BMC Operations** 
 , you will define and implement the departments ways of working, overseeing and enhancing BMC operations to ensure top-notch efficiency and data quality.. This role offers you the opportunity to influence and innovate within the BMC field, combining strategic vision with hands-on operational management. Additionally, you will be part of the Brand, Marketing and Communication Management Team and report to the Vice President of Brand, Marketing, and Communication. Location for this role is flexible within Europe, APAC region or Americas.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 As the Director of BMC Operations, you will shape and execute our strategic initiatives. You will collaborate with the BMC management team to develop and implement the Seco BMC strategy, roadmap, and scorecard, ensuring alignment with Sandvik Machining Solutions and Group objectives. Your role includes designing a robust BMC Process framework, including marketing plan creation.
   

  

 You will develop and own the Seco BMC technology roadmap, driving its execution with SMS and Sandvik Group stakeholders. Leading the adoption of cutting-edge marketing technologies will be key.
   

  

 Partnering with Finance, you will ensure accurate monthly reporting on BMC costs and budget, analyze deviations, and create actionable plans. You will also oversee annual BMC operational planning and reporting.
   

  

 You will lead and support key projects, represent BMC in various councils, and manage the annual BMC Function communication agenda, including all-employee meetings.
   

  

 Additionally, you will lead special projects identified by the VP of BMC, driving innovation and excellence.
   

  

**About You**
 We are looking for someone with Master or Bachelor’s degree in Business Economics, or related field and minimum 5-7 years’ experience working as a Business developer or Project Manager, preferable on Brand, Marketing and Communication performance.
   

  

 Our ideal candidate demonstrates strong leadership skills, efficiently manages budgets, and exhibits a professional and proactive work ethic with a pragmatic and customer-focused approach. You should excel in time management, have a proven track record in financial reporting and project management, and be able to simplify complex concepts and communicate them clearly. Self-motivation and proficiency in Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel, and other Microsoft 365 applications as needed are essential, as is valuing the experience of working in a global environment. You excel in both written and verbal English communication and possess the ability to provide leadership and collaborate effectively with executives and key stakeholders. Additionally, a growth mindset is essential, as you will collaborate with peers to influence the direction of the newly established Brand, Marketing and Communication department.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 A dynamic and innovative work environment within a leading organization in the cutting tools industry. A people-centric company making a difference in the machining industry. A global, diverse, and passionate team and opportunities for professional growth and development.
   

  

**Our Seco culture**
 Seco employees across the globe share our family spirit, along with a passion for our customers and a personal commitment to ensure success in everything we do. For us, it’s also clear that our diversities form an amazing foundation for achieving great results. Visit our LinkedIn or Facebook to get to know us and our products further.
   

  

**Application**
 Send your application no later
 **than** 
**March,26** 
 2025. Read more about us and apply at secotools.com (Job ID: R0076323).
   

  

 As we aim for a fair recruitment process, we utilize assessment tools to safeguard objectivity. When you apply for this job, you will therefore receive an invitation via email to a personality and logic ability test. Feedback comes immediately after the test has been completed and the selection process begins after the application deadline.
   

  

**Contact Information**
 For further information about this position please contact a member of our project team Praskovia Sheremeteva, Praskovia.sheremeteva@sandvik.com
   

  

*At Seco we develop and offer advanced products & solutions that make metal cutting easier. We work together with our customers to identify and implement the best solutions for their needs. The corporate culture empowers employees through shared values: Passion for our customers, Family Spirit, Personal commitment. Seco Tools has a presence in more than 75 countries and employs about 4000 people.*
